name: Calculator 2: The Game
summary:
The much-anticipated sequel returns to Calculator: The Game is here!

The world has been taken over by the Clicky virus and only one person can stop it … that’s you … you’re the one person.

The only person.

Use your trusty new state of the art SM-1K calculator and Dot, your quick-witted assistant, to track down Clicky and save the world!

In Calculator 2: The Game you’ll add, multiply, delete, reverse, convert, and turn numbers into letters … did we mention there are portals?

Oh yeah, there are portals to transport numbers through, no big deal.

Sure, you’ve used calculators before, but have you ever “played” a calculator?

Calculator 2: The Game features:
– LCD DISPLAY for relaxing numerical puzzle time
– COMFORTABLE BUTTONS designed for modern gameplay
– DOT, THE ASSISTANT who will help you catch Clicky
– APPROVED for use in Calculator: The Game
